dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue as the root cause but did not explicitly mention 拉檔 (frequency throttling).

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issue but did not mention SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the VCORE 725mV usage percentage but missed specific DDR percentages and CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was logical and correctly ruled out MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations were provided.
